changelog.md.Ajout d'une commande pour savoir si l'am: Addition of an order to know if the bulb is reachable or not
changelog.md.Ajout d'image pour les ampoules génériqu: Addition of image for generic bulbs
changelog.md.Correction de la remise à 0 de l'état de: Correction of resetting the lamp state to 0 when it is turned back on
changelog.md.Ajout d'un bouton pour supprimer une com: Add a button to delete an order
changelog.md.Correction des configuration pour les am: Correction of the configuration for the ikea bulbs (attention you must remove them from jeedom and redo a synchronization)
changelog.md.Support du retour d'état des prise OSRAM: Support for OSRAM SMART socket status feedback (attention requires reinclusion)
changelog.md.Ajout d'un bouton de synchronisation sur: Add a synchronization button on the equipment management page
changelog.md.Ajout de configuration de lumière géneri: Addition of color and non-color generic light configuration
changelog.md.Correction d'un bug sur l'état des bouto: Correction of a bug on the state of the buttons when restarting the bridge
changelog.md.Correction d'un bug sur l'invertion de p: Correction of a bug on the inversion of presence for the motion sensor (for those already created it will be necessary to tick the inversion cache on the line of the Presence command)
changelog.md.Correction d'un bug sur le statut des pi: Correction of a bug on the status of the pieces (on / off) if there is no color lamp in it
changelog.md.Correction d'un bug sur l'heure des vale: Correction of a bug on the time of the sensor values
changelog.md.Passage sur le nouveau système de doc: Switch to the new doc system
changelog.md.Ajout du modèle TRADFRI bulb GU10 W 400l: Addition of the TRADFRI bulb GU10 W 400lm model
changelog.md.Ajout d'animation (levé et couché de sol: Addition of animation (sunrise and sunset), be careful all
